captions.text:
We hopped in with Peewee to come here to
Harlem Nights ten or so
miles from Peewee's trap house.
We got here in about three minutes.

And he busted a bottle of promethazine,
right in front of an officer.

I think it's safe to say, he owns this
town.
Noisey presents
We're about to pull up on Peewee Longway
to shoot a quick music video,
at the Legendary Lobby.
Got good security in there.
Do we have to get wanded down or anything?

No, you might just get looked at a certain
way.
He doesn't live in this house.
It's just like, the club house
kinda or trap house I guess.
Maybe if it works.
We don't make music.

Yeah.
All that family here.

Got million dollar niggers in here, like
Metro Boomin,

that's a million dollar producer right
there, you know what I'm saying.

Ain't about-, shit, you hear, you feel I
look out for all the.
Peewee Longway guess he got kind of
popular doing stuff with Young Thug but
he's really awesome on his own.

He's like, as his name suggests he's about
like, my height.
He's put out a mix.
Bleu m&M, which I guess is him?

But could be, I guess, mean a lot of
things.

That jam is how high, which is PeeWee
charting his daily regimen.

I start my morning on three different
drugs, so molly, gasoline,

gas is really high powered weed, so
cocktails, pretty much.
About the opposite of coffee as it gets.
Which is how I start my day.

So we're just waiting on Peewee to show up
to the trap house.

I'm just hanging out in the kitchen, it's
a little cooler in here, so.

I just noticed there's a bullet hole in
the dishwasher though.
Maybe not the best place to be standing.

But hopefully Peewee will get here pretty
soon, get the video started.
How did that happen?
Someone angry at the dishwasher?
Ho many does that hold?
30, one in the clip.
That is an extended clip.
That is an extended clip.
Yeah, like weave extensions.

I think I might have figured out, just
based on observing.

Kind of like waistband height and gun
carrying techniques,

why the dishwasher has a bullet hole in
it.

While we waited on Peewee his lean dealer
stopped by the trap house, and

tried to sell a bottle to I guess Peewee's
official lean buyer.
Where the drank at?

Whoever he was, he seemed dubious about
the quality.
Why the bottle be red?
Look at this.
That man ain't gonna drink none of that.
It's like, he the plug and he got lean.
This nigga lean clean as fuck, man.
For real, bro.
Nigga really think a nigga try him, bro.
Naw, that what.

Showing up six hours past when you were
supposed to,
cancelling the night video shoot and
just budging the lean.
Where's my lean buddy at?
Where'd my lean brother go?
That ain't lean.
That ain't Actavis?

Peewee announced that we were all going to
a club,
where he's booked to play at.
This is 4 a.m mind you.
We're going to all the night.
Nights though.

Come straight forward, come straight
forward.
They laughing.
Think they gonna be in the damn patio.
Man dudes directing traffic.

Here.
It's like a really slow backwards
game of Tetris.
I ain't no parking lot dude.
No, everything got.
Where we going?
Can I ride with you?
Hell yeah.
Can we put a microphone on you real quick?
All that, man.
Get in the van if I hadn't.
I'm late for my own show.
What's up with it, Tommy, man?
Tell me something about yourself, gangsta.
Tell me something about yourself, man.
My name is Thomas, I'm from New York.
I like your house, your traphouse.
Bando.

Your office.
Office, motherfucker.
Where are we headed right now?
Downtown Atlanta, motherfucker.

By the way, bro, they're saying you're
from the east side on the radio, bro.
Who they say from the east side?
They said you from the east side.

He's bringing the whole east side with
him, huh?

Yeah, I gotta let the camera know that
shit got me fucked up, man.
Longway ain't from the motherfuckin.
From the motherfuckin east side, man.
I'm serious.
Tell them what's up man.
Zone 3 area, man, Atlanta, Georgia.
We're representing.
Fuck twelve.
West side nigga bang motherfucker bang.

We hopped in with Pee Wee, to come here to
Harlem nights.
Ten or so miles from Pee Wee's trap house.
We got here in about three minutes.
And busted a bottle of promethazine,
I dont know, it'd be safe to say,
he owns this town.

Peewee's gas was, as expected of the man
who wrote Sneak in a Geek.

The strongest earthly weed I've ever
smoked, maybe next to troubles.

I was soundly fucked, for the remainder of
the night.

At one point, two girls began twerking
against me, and I was so
high I not only didn't know what to do,

I didn't know how to describe the fact
that I didn't know what to do.

I just stood there and went This is a good
crowd.
Are you gonna play?
Yeah I'm gonna perform in a minute.
Yeah.
Oh, cool, cool.

Whereas Trouble's ducted weed cast me into
a mire of primeval white boy fear and.
Oh, yeah?

Peewee's gas launched me into a joyous
cartoon world, where trouble isn't real,

where you can drive a truck 100 miles an
hour through multiple red lights,
drink a bottle of drugs on a cop's shoe,

and everybody's just glad you made it to
the show on time.

Bear with me if this is just a bunch of
stony baloney, but seeing the psychedelic

nature of the Atlanta trap scene, through
the appropriately high lens.

It made me understand why this is truly
black Hollywood,

not just because a bunch or rich, black
actors and ball players live here,

but in the full dream factory sense of the
term.

This is a city where all it takes to
become a rap star is to have the right

beat at the right strip club at the right
night of the week.

Where beneath the friendly country-fried
drawl,

they an underbelly of ghetto boys ask
darkness and violence.

Where a demented midget can screech I'm
straight out of the mud to an adoring

crowd, while a white nerd is rubbed by two
asses and

a cop outside has to wipe Promethazine off
his boot cuz even he's in on the game.
Holy hell, I am blazed.
That was sick man.
I got tequila
on my shoes.

I still don't get what he meant when he says that he busted a bottle of 
lean on the officer's shoes. You could hear glass breaking when the bottle 
was apparently dropped, even though it's never actually seen, and in my 
experience codeine/promethazine syrup doesn't come in glass bottles. 
They're plastic. Or maybe he had it in a different bottle than the original 
container, I just thought it was odd.﻿
